roleset.name: cherish
roleset.note: TREASURE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. Member of Vncls admire-31.2. Edited by Julia, 11/2010. (from treasure.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: American friends Mr. Sackler and his wife , have wholeheartedly contributed alot to carrying forward our art of calligraphy , and hope to introduce this brilliant art to theworld , to let more friends learn and treasure it .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: We could n't have guessed that Martine would treasure her just as much as my wife does .
example.arg: just as much as my wife does
